campaign.subject: Set up email marketing in 10 minutes
campaign.description: How to set up and send email campaigns

slides.title: Email Marketing Setup
slides.narration: Email marketing is one of the highest ROI channels available. Let's get you set up in ten minutes so you can start reaching your customers directly.

slides.title: What You'll Learn
slides.narration: In this tutorial: setting up your sender profile so emails come from you, importing your contacts legally, creating your first email, and scheduling and sending. Everything you need to start.

slides.title: Step 1: Sender Profile
slides.narration: First, set up your sender profile. From name: your business name so people recognize you. From email: needs to be verified—we'll send a confirmation. Reply-to email: where responses go. Physical address: required by law for commercial emails.

slides.title: Step 2: Import Contacts

content.important: Only import people who opted in

slides.narration: Import your contacts. Upload a CSV file with emails, connect from your CRM, enter manually, or set up a signup form. Critical: only import people who opted in to hear from you. Sending to purchased lists damages your reputation and may violate laws.

slides.title: Step 3: Create Email
slides.narration: Create your first email. Choose a template—we have designs for announcements, promotions, newsletters. Add your content—keep it focused on one main message. Include images to catch attention. Set a clear call-to-action—what do you want readers to do?

slides.title: Step 4: Test and Send
slides.narration: Before sending, always test. Send a test email to yourself. Check how it looks on mobile—most people read on phones. Verify all links work. Review your subject line—this determines if people open. Then schedule for optimal time or send immediately.

slides.title: Pro Tips

tips: Include one clear CTA per email

slides.narration: Email pro tips. Best send times are typically Tuesday through Thursday, around ten AM or two PM. Keep subject lines under fifty characters so they don't get cut off. Include one clear call-to-action per email. Clean your list quarterly—remove people who never open.

slides.title: Start Emailing
slides.narration: Ready to start? Create your first email now—our templates make it easy. Or browse templates first to find one that fits your message. Your customers are waiting to hear from you.
